tweet: We must reaffirm our collective commitment to Brown by holding this Administration accountable, enforcing federal civil rights laws, and supporting local efforts to end inequities and integrate public schools.

The Trump Admin is showing hostility toward efforts to diversify schools and has repeatedly rolled back critical guidance that protected students’ civil rights. They also propose ‘Education Freedom Scholarships,’ which would exacerbate inequity & drain public resources.

65 years after #BrownvBoard, we must acknowledge that we have yet to fulfill the promise of this landmark case. Today we are seeing the re-segregation of schools, and a rise in racially and socioeconomically isolated schools. pic.twitter.com/K9tzYXIBKk

The climate crisis affects our entire economy, and supporting workers must be central to our transition to a clean energy economy. Confronting climate change requires innovation, and federal investments in R&D are critical to developing and deploying new clean energy technologies

Today @ClimateCrisis recognized the alarming findings from the latest @IPCC_CH report and started talking about meaningful solutions to #ActOnClimate. We must put our nation on a path to achieve net-zero emissions no later than mid-century. pic.twitter.com/ibBEhAOqvH

Our communities are safer when everyone can participate in the justice system without fear. I will continue pushing for legislation to require ICE to stay out of sensitive locations, including places of worship, schools, and courthouses.

This is another troubling report about ICE intimidating people in a courthouse. .@NOAA’s interactive story map illustrates some of the socioeconomic effects of harmful algal blooms in 40 communities. We must do more to support communities and industries affected by HABs. https://noaa.maps.arcgis.com/apps/Cascade/index.html?appid=9e6fca29791b428e827f7e9ec095a3d7 …

Harmful algal blooms harm the health of our oceans & freshwater systems. As Co-Chair of House Oceans Caucus & Congressional Estuary Caucus, I led legislation last year to improve our response to HABs, but our understanding of socioeconomic effects of HABs remains incomplete.

To all the LGBTQ and gender nonconforming people who are following today's hearing, know that we see you and hear you. I strongly encourage my colleagues to support the #EqualityAct.

We cannot ignore stories like Kai’s, or pretend that they are isolated incidents. We cannot accept the status quo, in which an individual’s basic civil rights are recognized in one state, but then potentially cease to exist when they cross state lines. #EqualityAc pic.twitter.com/Hx6U6E8BOv

In a majority of states today, there are no clear protections for #LGBTQ individuals in education, employment, housing, and health care. At today’s @EdLaborCmte, we've heard about how individuals and families struggle against discrimination.

The bipartisan #EqualityAct is our opportunity to affirm that this country’s landmark civil rights laws guarantee all people the right to be safe, secure, and free from discrimination. We must stand against discrimination based on sexual orientation & gender identity. pic.twitter.com/0ExWY3lZUb

Protecting net neutrality is about keeping the internet open and fair for everyone. Consumers – not wealthy corporations – should drive internet traffic. I am proud to support the #SaveTheNet Act. pic.twitter.com/Wz4ARw6Huh

These four bipartisan bills demonstrate clear support for expanding federal research on ocean & coastal acidification. Our oceans & estuaries are very vulnerable to the climate change. We cannot afford to wait. I look forward to @HouseScience moving these bills to the House Floor
I joined my Congressional Estuary Caucus Co-Chair @congbillposey in introducing the NEAR Act, which would address the urgent need for research on ocean and coastal acidification in estuaries.

I co-led @RepDerekKilmer's Ocean Acidification Innovation Act, which would address persistent funding gaps in ocean acidification research, encourage collaboration, & spur innovative strategies to mitigate and adapt to changes in ocean chemistry through a prize competition.

I am also proud to be an original cosponsor of @chelliepingree's Coastal Communities Ocean Acidification Act, which would improve our understanding of the socioeconomic effects and vulnerabilities of ocean acidification.

Changes in ocean chemistry endanger shellfish, salmon, and other finfish & threaten the blue economy, including fisheries that depend on the oceans’ resources to support their families, & Tribes with deep cultural and historical connections to diminishing species.

I introduced the #COASTResearchAct with @repdonyoung, @chelliepingree, & @congbillposey to expand scientific research & monitoring to improve our understanding of ocean & coastal acidification and inform vulnerable communities and industries on how to prepare and adapt.

Our oceans & estuaries face immediate threats from increasing carbon emissions. I'm proud @HouseScience Enviro Subcommittee passed my bipartisan #COASTResearchAct to address ocean acidification & look forward to consideration in the Full Committee soon. https://bonamici.house.gov/media/press-releases/bonamici-young-pingree-posey-introduce-bipartisan-bill-address-health-oceans …

I support H.R. 1010, which would reverse the administration’s expansion of these problematic plans. Our laws should not allow insurers to sell junk plans that fail to include basic protections that grant access to lifesaving care.

No one plans on a catastrophic injury or expects a cancer diagnosis.
